metadata.title: CVE-2024-21911 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: TinyMCE versions before 5.6.0 are affected by a stored cross-site scriptingvulnerability. An unauthenticated and remote attacker could insert craftedHTML into the editor resulting in arbitrary JavaScript execution in anotheruser's browser.

criterions.comment: tinymce package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
